actor-start.eventDescription: Flat fee for starting an Actor run.

actor-running-time.eventDescription: Cost per running time for each 5 minutes.

input-tokens-sonnet-3-7.eventDescription: Cost per 100 input tokens for Claude 3.7 Sonnet (1M tokens = 3$).

output-tokens-sonnet-3-7.eventDescription: Cost per 100 output tokens for Claude 3.7 Sonnet (1M tokens = 15$).

input-tokens-haiku-3-5.eventDescription: Cost per 100 input tokens for Claude 3.5 Haiku (1M tokens = 0.8$).

output-tokens-haiku-3-5.eventDescription: Cost per 100 output tokens for Claude 3.5 Haiku (1M tokens = 4$).
